lines.text: From your clothes I would deduce - you're going to a wedding.

[laughs heartily]
At last I've got you. For once in your life you're wromg.
I'm not going to a wedding! I'm coming from one!

[sardonically]
Give them my congratulations or perhaps condolences.
Rubbish! We all come to it, my dear fellow.

[he laughs again]
We all come to it. Goodbye.

[alone, ironically and sadly, after Watson has left]
Not all, my dear Watson... not all.
